feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.142.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: secrets detection in secret manager by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4244
  • misc: removed CLI repository by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4262
  • improvement(frontend): add back secret scanning unresolved finding count to sidebar by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4257
  • Fix secret version history link to user/machine details page by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4264
  • doc: add bootstrap to API reference by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4266
  • Fix scim user updates setting isEmailVerified back to false when the email has not changed by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4265
  • fix(fips): x86 support by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4267
  • feat(app-connection, secret-sync): Gateway for GitHub App Connections & Secret Syncs by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4240

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.141.0-postgres...infisical/v0.142.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.143.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • improvement(frontend): improve secret reference styling and reduce debounce by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4258
  • Prevent users from deleting the last payment method attached to the org by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4212
  • fix: update passport saml by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4275
  • improvement(frontend): make login/org selection loading screens consistent by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4273
  • improvement(frontend): revise org alter banner designs and add smtp banner by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4259
  • fix(app-connections): github app connection creation by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4276
  • Fix SQL app connection with gateways by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4277
  • improvement(azure-client-secret-rotation): reduce token expiry to two rotation intervals by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4279
  • Add Azure Client Secrets Auth to Azure App Connections by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4271

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.142.0-postgres...infisical/v0.143.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.144.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix conditional permissions check on secret access request hidden values by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4280
  • feature(secret-scanning): gitlab secret scanning by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4256
  • improvement(frontend/docs): update favicon for app and docs by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4283
  • improvement(org-memberships): add bulk delete org memberships endpoint and table support by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4269
  • chore(hsm): add hsm support to main docker image by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4281
  • fix(external-migration/vault): fix vault parsing by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4290
  • feat(app-connections, PKI): Cloudflare as DNS provider by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4286
  • feat: Add Netlify app connection and secrets sync by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4205
  • feat: events system implementation by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4246
  • improvement(server-admin): add bulk delete users support, bulk actions server admin table support, overflow/truncation and dropdown improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4291

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.143.0-postgres...infisical/v0.144.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.145.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: audit log disable storage flag by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4295
  • FIX: x509 SAN Extension to accept IPs and URLs as args by @JuliusMieliauskas in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4282
  • feat(app-connections): GitHub Enterprise Server support by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4292
  • improvement(email-templates): simplify email design, refactor link/button to re-usable components and improve design by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4284
  • feat: Secret reminder from date filter by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4289
  • Add timeout to audit log by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4302
  • improvements: adjust secret search padding when no clear icon and fix access approval reviewer tooltips display by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4293
  • fix: add react import to email button component by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4305
  • docs(agent-injector): ldap auth method by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4299
  • log github error by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4306
  • feat: ldap auth for k8s operator by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4296
  • Update Helm chart to version v0.9.5 by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4307
  • fix github hostname check by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4308
  • feat(helm): add support for imagePullSecrets by @cyrgim in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4287
  • Log available auth methods on password reset by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4309
  • Add Machine Auth Templates by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4300
  • Update docs to be multi-product by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4301

New Contributors

  • @JuliusMieliauskas made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4282
  • @cyrgim made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4287

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.144.0-postgres...infisical/v0.145.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.146.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow users to type the same original value on bulk commits and remove them if no changes are left by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4310
  • Add empty state and improve upgrade plan logic on Identity Auth Templates by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4311
  • improvement(frontend): make secret overview table header sticky, add underlines to env header links and limit table height for scroll by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4298
  • Fix an issue on reminder recipients when all recipients are deleted on an update by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4315
  • Fix edge case where users with edit but not read permission on new commit row logic by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4314
  • Events system docs by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4294
  • feat: srp removal by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4270
  • Update prerequisites sections for secret syncs/rotations to include being able to accept requests… by @0xArshdeep in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4316
  • FIX: SAN extension field in certificate issuance by @JuliusMieliauskas in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4313
  • improvement(frontend): update styling and overflow for audit log filter by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4322
  • fix(frontend): correctly parse fetch audit log error message by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4323
  • servername host for mssql by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4324
  • fix: improve vault folders mapping by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4320
  • feat: adds support for last logged in auth method field by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4319
  • misc: address LDAP config update and test issues by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4329

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.145.0-postgres...infisical/v0.146.0-postgres
